Starting last winter, I was fortunate enough to land a position as a Band Manager at Stephen F. Austin State University. A typical administration undergraduate position: print upcoming cycle music, set up rehearsal areas, as well as the manage intrument catalog through Charms

Agile, a concept familiar in the Software Development world, is a methodology used to quickly, and iteritvely, deliver value to a customer. A majority of start-up companies

Next step: move over to Slack

Follow me on Twitter!

— Cole Spears (@colekspears) December 23, 2019
